name: GumDrop
description:
How to play: Drag and shoot.

GumDrop is a puzzle game that was done under 24 hours. 

It's fun, and satisfying.

The character is a gumball that stick to walls trying to collect stars, in order to unlock new levels.

The game is still under development, more levels to come.

Any type of feedback is highly appreciated.

Thanks for reading!!
